s0118: I have the great lords of states, the Minister of Works, Minister of War, Minister of the Masses, subordinate officers, commanders, captains of a thousand, captains of a hundred, and the people of Yong, Shu, Qiang, Mao, Wei, Lu, Peng, and Pu. Raise your spears, array your shields, set your lances, I will make my oath.'
s0119: The king said: 'The ancients had a saying: 'The hen does not crow at dawn.
s0120: If the hen crows at dawn, it brings ruin to the family.'
s0121: Now the Yin king Zhou only uses the words of women, abandons his ancestors' generous sacrifices without response, carelessly abandons his state and family, neglects his royal parents and brothers without employing them, but honors and promotes the many criminals and fugitives from the four directions, trusts and employs them, causing violence and oppression to the common people, bringing chaos and rebellion to the Shang state.'
s0122: Now I Fa will jointly execute Heaven's punishment.
s0123: Today the battle must be decisive, we will not return until evening.'
s0124: In the second month, day jiazi, the Zhou army defeated the Yin at Muye.
s0125: King Zhou fled, burned himself in the Deer Tower.
s0126: King Wu cut off his head, hung it on a white banner.
s0127: He attacked Yan, killed Bi Gan the loyal minister, released Mi Zi, restored Jizi.
s0128: He divided the Yin lands, enfeoffed the Zhou lords.
s0129: He returned to Fenghao, the four directions all submitted.
s0130: He made the Duke of Zhou prime minister, to govern the eastern regions.
s0131: In the second year, King Wu toured the eastern regions.
